data.eml:eml: RedIscovery of the rare ant genus Bannapone (Hymenoptera: FormIcIdae: AmblyoponInae) and descrIptIon of the worker caste

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guénard, Benoit, Blanchard, Benjamin, Liu, Cong, Yang, Da-Rong, Economo, Evan (2013): RedIscovery of the rare ant genus Bannapone (Hymenoptera: FormIcIdae: AmblyoponInae) and descrIptIon of the worker caste. Zootaxa 3734 (3): 371-379, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3734.3.6
